post.text: Thank you to my amazing supporters outside of Trump Tower this afternoon. #ImWithYou

comment.author: Cathryne
comment.text: I am totally behind you. As a woman I am not offended, men talk to other men differently than to women, that was many years ago, none of these people blasting you are lily white themselves and they are desperate if this is the best they can do. You haven't killed anyone , jeopardized national security or had a chuckle over a child rapist getting off. Aside from being a Socialist hell bent on controlling people, Clinton is an evil person in addition to being a criminal being given a pass courtesy of Obama and company.

replies.author: Alexandra
replies.text: But he is currently accused of being a child rapist...

replies.author: Cathryne
replies.text: Alexandra Really ? Are you a paid Clinton troll ?

replies.author: Scott
replies.text: And being a Socialist, her true agenda just came to light - hillary wants America in a One-world order! She cares nothing for America, she just wants to line her pockets, with money from foreign countries. She has sold the American People up the river.
